body.name: BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster Oven with Easy Controls, Stainless Steel, TO1705SB,Medium
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 7 hrs 14 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: Four Cooking Functions: Choose from convection bake, broil, toast, and keep warm.
Compact Size: Easily fit a 9” pizza, four slices of bread, or a variety of other snacks and meals.
30-Minute Timer: The precise cooking timer features a stay-on function for longer baking tasks.
Included Rack and Pan: The included rack and bake pan fit perfectly in the toaster oven.
EvenToast Technology: Up to 30% more even toasting than previous BLACK+DECKER toaster ovens.
body.description: Great for cooking snacks and whipping up appetizers fast! This toaster oven fits a 9” pizza or four slices of bread, and the simplified dial controls let you set the 30-minute timer and choose to bake, broil, toast, or keep warm. Plus, our exclusive EvenToast Technology toasts bread up to 30% more evenly* so you get excellent toasting results every time. *compared to previous BLACK+DECKER Toaster Ovens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple and efficient
reviews.reviewText: I liked that it is a toaster oven that toasts bread very quickly. It is a simple appliance, does not airfry, etc, just makes excellent toast quickly. I replaced a multifunction appliance that took many minutes to make toast and I didn’t use the other functions. This one works great and the cost was very reasonable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good Value for $$$
reviews.reviewText: My toaster oven broke and I needed a replacement so of course I went for the one I had before BLACK+DECKER. Just a bit more simplified. I had the 3 nobs before and just wanted something a bit more straightforward. Saw this one and it was cheaper so I ordered it. The previous one I had I think lasted me a good 3 years before it broke. So I am hoping for the same with this one. Delivery was quick and the product was delivered with care to my home in the box you see shown. What I really love about this BLACK+DECKER 4-Slice Toaster Oven with Easy Controls, Stainless Steel, TO1705SB, Medium is its simplicity! My 12-year-old had a little trouble with the first one but this is so straightforward that she has no issues using it. So far I am like I said happy and satisfied. Best $25.86 spent!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great toaster oven
reviews.reviewText: I brought it to my father and he enjoys it. The functionality is simple and easy to understand to use it. The design is great and better the old one that the door never close tight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I needed a toaster that was easy to use for the different ages in the house. This toaster is perfect. Everyone likes it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient little guy
reviews.reviewText: Great for your morning bagel, and for your midnight pizza rolls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This little oven is great except that I can't figure out how to use the "Stay On" feature
reviews.reviewText: I live off the grid - that is, I make my own electricity with solar panels. Because I live this way, conserving electricity is important. That's the main reason I bought this little toaster oven: it doesn't require a lot of electricity.I've only been using this oven for a week or so. So far, I've used it to bake artisan bread, scalloped potatoes, and cranberry muffins. It works great, except for one thing: I can't figure out how to use the "Stay On" feature. Regardless of whether I turn the knob clockwise or counterclockwise, I can't get it to point at "Stay On." Because of this, I have to keep re-setting the timer if I need to bake anything for more than 30 minutes. This is a major annoyance, because the "Stay On" feature is the main reason I chose this particular toaster oven over other small toaster ovens.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great for toasting
reviews.reviewText: Use mostly for toasting, but it’s barely large enough for 4 slices of toast. No matter how many slices, it toasts very unevenly…dark around the edges. I kept it for a month to give it a chance before returning. I gave it 3 stars because the baking feature is ok.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works as described. Not too bulky, so looks nice on the countertop.
